sentences.english: The Shagou ore deposit is a large-size silver-lead-zinc deposit in west Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 河南熊耳山沙沟矿床是新探明的一个大型银铅锌矿床。

sentences.english: Xiongershan area is one of the major concentration areas of gold mineralization in western Henan.
sentences.chinese: 熊耳山区是豫西主要的金矿化集中区之一。
